Function setCoefficients(codi::RealReverse, codi::RealReverse, model_constants_t&)¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

void setCoefficients(codi::RealReverse p_prime, codi::RealReverse T_prime, model_constants_t &cc)

Set the constants for the cloud model from given environmental conditions.

Parameters

  • p_prime: Initial pressure in Pa

  • T_prime: Initial temperature in Kelvin

  • cc: Pointer to constants from the model. On out: modified constants
